Designed for professional use, the cart is NSF certified for use in dry environments. It has a weight limit of 500 lbs. evenly distributed between shleves. Includes four swivel wheels, 2 locking. Cart measures 34 inches wide by 18 inches deep and 33.5 inches high when fully assembled. No tools required for assembly.
